name: Gram/Balmung
shortDescription: Sigurd's Legendary Dragon-Slaying Sword, Gift of Odin
fullDescription:
Sigurd's Legendary Dragon-Slaying Sword, Gift of Odin Gram (Old Norse: Gramr, meaning "wrath" or "fierce") stands as one of the most celebrated weapons
                    in Germanic and Norse legend. Known as Balmung in the German Nibelungenlied tradition, this sword
                    represents the pinnacle of legendary weaponry—a blade destined for greatness, wielded by the
                    greatest hero of the North, and responsible for one of mythology's most famous dragon-slayings.

properties.name: Divine Origin
properties.value: Thrust into the Branstock tree by Odin
